channel.title: 2 worlds question
channel.description: Is it possible to make 2 worlds, and have all the character files be on both worlds? Like both worlds automatically update character files.

item.title: 2 worlds question
item.dc:creator: @h3rbl0re h3rbl0re
item.description:
@h3rbl0re wrote:

nevermind, im not making 2 worlds. haha

Read full topic

item.title: 2 worlds question
item.dc:creator: @r0ckstar96 r0ckstar96
item.description:
@r0ckstar96 wrote:

Found this in an old thread:

[quote=“ry60003333, post:7, topic:282976”]First, never host more then one server on one computer unless your an idiot. It defeats the whole point of having multiple worlds and just adds more overhead.

If you want to have multiple worlds, you need you have one computer for each world, and if you’re hosting them from the same location they each must listen on another port. Also, you need a method of sharing the accounts (such as a database like MySQL), and you will need some way to ensure that no player is on two worlds at the same time. Additionally, you need someway to make the friends list work between worlds. You need to write a Master Server that all the worlds connect to in order to do this. I’ve already done all this.[/quote]

Read full topic
